text:
Education: MS in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 4 Internships ( 3 in software development, 1 in Data Science)
Date of the Offer: Oct'2019
Company: Mathworks
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Natick (Boston), MA
Salary: $101,000
Relocation: $4,000 for Relocation package (Travel, transportation of goods, initial temporary housing, etc)
Signing Bonus: $4,000
Stock bonus: No Stocks
Bonus: Company performance + my performance based quarterly bonuses (ranges between 5%-25%. Average 12%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~$121K
Benefits: 15 paid vacation days + negotiable sick leave days + 8 paid U.S. holidays + 3 paid personal days + 1 day of paid Social work + 50% 401k/Roth match up to 6% of base Salary + covered health/dental/vision
Other details: Still haven't negotiated (If anyone has any idea about this role, please reach out to help me negotiate). Two weeks given to accept or decline.
